paragraphs.text:
%spark
import org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext
                
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.{StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType, DateType};

val customSchema = StructType( Array( StructField("year", DateType, true), 
                                      StructField("value", IntegerType, true)))

val sqlContext = new SQLContext(sc)
val populationHistoryDF = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").
                         option("header", "true").
                         option("delimiter",",").
                         option("charset", "UTF-8").
                         option("treatEmptyValuesAsNulls", "True").
                         option("mode", "DROPMALFORMED").
                         schema(customSchema).load("/tmp/postgres_data/london-population-history.csv")

//populationHistoryDF.printSchema()                         
//populationHistoryDF.show()

msg.data:
warning: there was one deprecation warning; re-run with -deprecation for details
import org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.{StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType, DateType}
customSchema: org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType = StructType(StructField(year,DateType,true), StructField(value,IntegerType,true))
sqlContext: org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext = org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext@549250a0
populationHistoryDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [year: date, value: int]

paragraphs.text:
import java.util.Properties


val connectionProperties = new Properties()
connectionProperties.put("user", "zeppelin_admin")
connectionProperties.put("password", "zeppelin_admin")
  
populationHistoryDF.write
    .option("driver", "org.postgresql.Driver")
    .mode("overwrite")
    .jdbc("jdbc:postgresql://postgresdb:5432/zeppelin", "zeppelin.london_population", connectionProperties)
